sentences.sentence: The first chapter is Philosophical Hermeneutics and legal Hermeneutics.
sentences.translation: 第一章“哲学诠释学与法律诠释学”。

sentences.sentence: I would say that all of those ways of reading the epitaph are consistent with hermeneutics.
sentences.translation: 可以说所有这些解读这条墓志铭的方法，都和现代阐释学相一致。

sentences.sentence: We'll get into the proper or at least more systematic business of the course when we turn to hermeneutics next week.
sentences.translation: 下周我们讲到阐释学的时候，将会真正地或者说更系统地对这门课程进行讲解。
